title: Pagetype timer content
description: Description of the content of the Pagetype 'timer '

textBefore.description: The text shown on the Page while the timer is still running. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

textAfter.description: The text shown on the Page after the timer has expired. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

timer.description: The Amount of seconds the Timer will run. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

imgBefore.description: Filename of the image thats shown while the timer is running. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'mp4', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif'. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

imgAfter.description: Filename of the image thats shown after the timer has expired. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'mp4', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif'. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties
